Package org.apache.nutch.analysis

Tokenizer for documents and query parser.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NutchAnalysisConstants
    Token literal values and constants.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnalyzerFactory
    Creates and caches NutchAnalyzer plugins.
    CommonGrams
    Construct n-grams for frequently occurring terms and phrases while indexing.
    NutchAnalysis
    The JavaCC-generated Nutch lexical analyzer and query parser.
    NutchAnalysisTokenManager
    Token Manager.
    NutchAnalyzer
    Extension point for analysis.
    NutchDocumentAnalyzer
    The analyzer used for Nutch documents.
    NutchDocumentTokenizer
    The tokenizer used for Nutch document text.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ParseException
    This exception is thrown when parse errors are encountered.
